text: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

translation.en: Say, "Travel through the land; then observe how was the end of the deniers
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Jelajahilah bumi, kemudian perhatikanlah bagaimana kesudahan orang-orang yang mendustakan itu
